availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Wilhoit. Father of William Wilhoit, Mary Anne Wilhoit, Caroline Wilhoit, Merriman Wilhoit, Richard A. Wilhoit, Frances Wilhoit, Amanda Wilhoit, and Elizabeth Wilhoit. Farmer in Boone County in 1850. Farmer in Boone County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District no. 2, p. 218B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence District, p. 261.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence, p. 187.
Find A Grave, "Allen Wilhoit (1803-1875)," Memorial #134722784, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/134722784 (accessed October 18, 2018).
